name: DisasterSurvivorAssistance
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
When you have been affected by a major disaster or your municipality has a disaster declaration, knowing where the disaster recovery centers are and what time they will open and close down permanently is vital. Since internet service is a top priority. You can get access to updated recovery information through your Alexa app on your smartphone or other mobile devices such as a Fire Tablet and many other Alexa enabled devices.

Please share this information to all who are in need. 

More regional briefings will be added sooon.
